channel.title: Need help adding a few things!(offering co-owner)
channel.description:
I'm using Danger-scape 317 source (Delta)
Add my msn [Lindsayvague@live.com] if interested
I am interested in offering Co-Owner or 50$ on my server to whoever can help me add a few things.
the godwars in some servers that has like all the bandos,saradomin,zammy,armadyl monsters than you kill 20 of them and u choose a boss to go fight.. (minions etc at boss) (offering 10$ USD) Barrows ABOVE there hills like 8+ of all barrows above each hill..e.g...(8 ahrims above ahrims hill) (Offering 3$ USD) Combat following!(range,mage,melee) (Offering 7$ USD) Xlogging server side...(30 second timer, lose stuff on death) (Offering 5$ USD) Fix armadyl wearing glitch .E.G. invisible when wearing skirt\ plate is glitched. (2$ USD) i am offering 35$ USD for ALL or Co-owner on my server, YOU will go first unless you have 300+ rep or you are a moderator+

item.title: Need help adding a few things!(offering co-owner)
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Offering to pay for server work isn’t allowed here.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help adding a few things!(offering co-owner)
item.dc:creator: @tb1 tb
item.description:
@tb1 wrote:

Rofl kinda sounds like your a noob from when you said " you go first unless you have 300+ rep or are a moderator "

first id like to say you cannot have over 200 reputation, so that leaves you looking like a novice right there.
second most moderators dont do this type stuff for the players, tons of people want their help lol.

anyway goodluck…

Read full topic
item.source: Need help adding a few things!(offering co-owner)
